mainText: 'I wouldn't say that chaos is my comfort tho haha. It's only sustainable for a short amount of time'

summary: Thomas, re: user wanting to present original concept for Hytale
mainText: 'Is it ideas you want to share to the Hytale team? You can use Twitter, or the official Hytale discord in fan art channel'

summary: Thomas, re: his feelings as Hytale approaches
mainText: 'For me, it's similar to Simon, it's in final sprints I'm the most determined and focused. It's when there is no plan, no control, no vision, no transparency that I'm getting anxious and feel pressured..which isn't the case right now.'

summary: Buddha, re: his day to day
mainText: 'Lots of spinning plates! Working with creators, the community, the team - busy but lots of fun! üòä'

'"it is what it is"
chaos is comfort'

summary: Thomas, re: Hawkon asking if eyelash cosmetics are a thing
mainText: 'For release it will be the simplest version of player face (and it's already complicated haha) and we won't split eyelashes from eyelids yet but we would like to work on a better system in the future so you can have matching eyelashes and make up on it etc. It's just systems we don't have'

summary: Thomas, re: User's Hytale fanart/concept board
Slikey, re: Syprus proposing Creators get a 30-60 min early access before launch
mainText: 'We don't have any technical possibility to do this. It is simply just an on or off switch - nobody can get access before anymore else.'

summary: Buddha, re: Hatsuya saying the community has been and always will be here.
Buddha, re: Prowl asking how many anxious butterflies he has
mainText: 'I thrive during times like this :P I was just talking with @Simon_Hypixel about this. He gets all zen when there's lots of pressure. And for me - I'm in a constant state of neurotic, anxious, antsy nerves. So when its time for *real* action - I get locked tf in :P'

summary: Oscar, re: Buddha's feelings on Launch
